transArray.content: Overall, it's okay. The location is convenient for travel. There are several buses nearby. I just had to wait for a while when checking in. The lowest price is for a room diagonally opposite the elevator. The noise is a bit loud at night next to the road. I woke up a few times and had a messy dream. There was always a faint smell of disinfectant in the room. I wonder if my sense of smell is too sensitive. The room was small, but fully equipped and clean. I am very satisfied with the clean and tidy facilities. Just call me Xiaodu for the smart facilities. The toilet is also smart. I am very satisfied with this. I encountered a robot several times in the elevator going up and downstairs. There is a coffee machine on the first floor of the Orange Hotel. You can have a cup if you are not in a hurry. It's very good to drink coffee. There are several restaurants nearby which are very convenient for dining.

Dear guest, thank you very much for sharing your stay experience. I'm really sorry for not letting you have a good rest. The rooms next to the road are equipped with double-glazed windows. You can't hear outside sounds when you close the windows. Check in If you have any questions during this period, you can contact us at any time. We will solve it for you in time. Your satisfaction is our ultimate goal. All employees once again apologize to you. We will strive to do our best and hope that we will have the opportunity to serve you in the near future. We look forward to your next visit!
